db:info.db:title: ItemModelSurfaceDataProxy QML Type
db:info.db:edition: Qt Data Visualization | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Proxy class for presenting data in item models with Surface3D.
This type was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type allows you to use AbstractItemModel derived models as a data source for Surface3D.
Data is resolved asynchronously whenever the mapping or the model changes.
For ItemModelSurfaceDataProxy enums, see QItemModelSurfaceDataProxy::MultiMatchBehavior.
For more details, see QItemModelSurfaceDataProxy documentation.
Usage example:

db:section.db:title: autoColumnCategories : bool
db:section.db:para: When set to true, the mapping ignores any explicitly set column categories and overwrites them with automatically generated ones whenever the data from the model is resolved. Proxy minimum and maximum column values are also autogenerated from the data when this is set to true. Defaults to true.

db:section.db:title: autoRowCategories : bool
db:section.db:para: When set to true, the mapping ignores any explicitly set row categories and overwrites them with automatically generated ones whenever the data from the model is resolved. Proxy minimum and maximum row values are also autogenerated from the data when this is set to true. Defaults to true.

db:section.db:title: columnCategories : list<String>
db:section.db:para: The column categories of the mapping. Only items with column roles that are found in this list are included when data is resolved. The columns are ordered in the same order as they are in this list.

db:section.db:title: columnRole : string
db:section.db:para: The item model role to map to the column category. In addition to defining which column the data belongs to, the value indicated by the column role is also set as the X-coordinate value of QSurfaceDataItem when model data is resolved, unless a separate x position role is also defined.

db:section.db:title: columnRolePattern : regExp
db:section.db:para: When set, a search and replace is done on the value mapped by the column role before it is used as a column category. This property specifies the regular expression to find the portion of the mapped value to replace and the columnRoleReplace property contains the replacement string.

db:section.db:title: columnRoleReplace : string
db:section.db:para: The replace content to be used in conjunction with columnRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see the QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.

db:section.db:title: itemModel : model
db:section.db:para: The item model used as a data source for Surface3D.

db:section.db:title: multiMatchBehavior : ItemModelSurfaceDataProxy.MultiMatchBehavior
db:section.db:para: Defines how multiple matches for each row/column combination are handled. Defaults to ItemModelSurfaceDataProxy.MMBLast.

For example, you might have an item model with timestamped data taken at irregular intervals and you want to visualize an average position of data items on each hour with a surface graph. This can be done by specifying row and column categories so that each surface point represents an hour, and setting multiMatchBehavior to ItemModelSurfaceDataProxy.MMBAverage.

db:section.db:title: rowCategories : list<String>
db:section.db:para: The row categories of the mapping. Only items with row roles that are found in this list are included when data is resolved. The rows are ordered in the same order as they are in this list.

db:section.db:title: rowRole : string
db:section.db:para: The item model role to map to the row category. In addition to defining which row the data belongs to, the value indicated by the row role is also set as the Z-coordinate value of QSurfaceDataItem when model data is resolved, unless a separate z position role is also defined.

db:section.db:title: rowRolePattern : regExp
db:section.db:para: When set, a search and replace is done on the value mapped by the row role before it is used as a row category. This property specifies the regular expression to find the portion of the mapped value to replace and the rowRoleReplace property contains the replacement string.

db:section.db:title: rowRoleReplace : string
db:section.db:para: The replace content to be used in conjunction with rowRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see the QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.

db:section.db:title: useModelCategories : bool
db:section.db:para: When set to true, the mapping ignores row and column roles and categories, and uses the rows and columns from the model instead. Defaults to false.

db:section.db:title: xPosRole : string
db:section.db:para: The item model role to map to the X position. If this role is not defined, columnRole is used to determine the X-coordinate value of the resolved QSurfaceDataItem items.

db:section.db:title: xPosRolePattern : regExp
db:section.db:para: When set, a search and replace is done on the value mapped by the x position role before it is used as an item position value. This property specifies the regular expression to find the portion of the mapped value to replace and the xPosRoleReplace property contains the replacement string.

db:section.db:title: xPosRoleReplace : string
db:section.db:para: The replace content to be used in conjunction with xPosRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see the QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.

db:section.db:title: yPosRole : string
db:section.db:para: The item model role to map to the Y position.

db:section.db:title: yPosRolePattern : regExp
db:section.db:para: When set, a search and replace is done on the value mapped by the y position role before it is used as an item position value. This property specifies the regular expression to find the portion of the mapped value to replace and the yPosRoleReplace property contains the replacement string.

db:section.db:title: yPosRoleReplace : string
db:section.db:para: The replace content to be used in conjunction with yPosRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see the QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.

db:section.db:title: zPosRole : string
db:section.db:para: The item model role to map to the Z position. If this role is not defined, rowRole is used to determine the Z-coordinate value of the resolved QSurfaceDataItem items.

db:section.db:title: zPosRolePattern : regExp
db:section.db:para: When set, a search and replace is done on the value mapped by the z position role before it is used as an item position value. This property specifies the regular expression to find the portion of the mapped value to replace and the zPosRoleReplace property contains the replacement string.

db:section.db:title: zPosRoleReplace : string
db:section.db:para: The replace content to be used in conjunction with zPosRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see the QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
